verbose_text: The immunohistochemistry staining revealed that pretreatment with NVP-BEZ235 (HB group) significantly attenuated the hypoxia induced MT, MA, AT and collagen deposition area (32.17 +/-1.75, 53.42 +/-2.34, 41.33 +/-4.04 and 25.60 +/-5.27, respectively) compared with the H group (P < 0.001, P = 0.0003, P = 0.0008 and P < 0.001, respectively) (XREF_FIG).
evidence: NVP-BEZ235 (HB group) significantly attenuated the hypoxia-induced MT, MA, AT and collagen
